text: Jim Miller (born November 10, 1947) is an American skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1968 Winter Olympics and the 1972 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:American male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of the United States Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1968 Winter Olympics Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1972 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Syracuse, New York
title: Jim Miller (skier)
